help.subtitle: Find answers to common questions and get the support you need

categories.gettingStartedDesc: Learn how to create an account and find events
categories.accountManagementDesc: Manage your profile, settings, and account details
categories.eventDiscoveryDesc: Find, search, and discover events that interest you
categories.ticketsDesc: Purchase, manage, and access your tickets
categories.paymentsDesc: Payment methods, refunds, and billing information
categories.favoritesDesc: Save and manage your favorite events
categories.orderHistoryDesc: View past purchases and download receipts
categories.mobileAppDesc: Download and use our mobile application

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.answer: Creating an account is easy! Click the "Register" button in the top navigation, fill in your details including email and password, and verify your email address. You'll be ready to start exploring events in no time.

findEvents.question: How do I find events?
findEvents.answer: You can browse events in several ways: use the search bar to find specific events, browse by category, use the calendar view to see events by date, or check out our featured events on the homepage.

purchaseTickets.question: How do I purchase tickets?
purchaseTickets.answer: To purchase tickets, first find an event you're interested in. Click on the event to view details, select your desired ticket type and quantity, then proceed to checkout. You can pay securely with credit card or other payment methods.

updateProfile.question: How do I update my profile information?
updateProfile.answer: Go to your Profile page from the user menu, click "Edit Profile", make your changes, and save. You can update your name, email, profile picture, and other personal information.

changePassword.question: How do I change my password?
changePassword.answer: Navigate to Settings > Security, click "Change Password", enter your current password and new password, then confirm the change. Make sure your new password is strong and unique.

deleteAccount.question: How do I delete my account?
deleteAccount.answer: To delete your account, go to Settings > Account, scroll to the bottom, and click "Delete Account". Please note this action is irreversible and will permanently remove all your data.

searchEvents.question: How do I search for events?
searchEvents.answer: Use the search bar to find events by name, location, or keywords. You can also filter by date, category, price range, and location to narrow down your results.

filterEvents.question: How do I filter events?
filterEvents.answer: Use the filter options to sort events by date, price, location, or category. You can also save your favorite filters for quick access in the future.

eventDetails.question: How do I view event details?
eventDetails.answer: Click on any event card to view full details including description, location, date, time, ticket prices, and organizer information.

eventRecommendations.question: How do I get event recommendations?
eventRecommendations.answer: Based on your browsing history and preferences, we'll show you personalized event recommendations on the homepage and in your account.

accessTickets.question: How do I access my tickets?
accessTickets.answer: Your tickets are available in the "My Tickets" section. You can view them on your phone for entry, download them as PDF, or print them. Each ticket has a unique QR code for entry.

transferTickets.question: Can I transfer my ticket to someone else?
transferTickets.answer: Yes, you can transfer tickets to another person. Go to "My Tickets", select the ticket, and click "Transfer". Enter the recipient's email address and they'll receive the ticket.

lostTickets.question: What if I lose my ticket?
lostTickets.answer: Don't worry! You can always access your tickets in the "My Tickets" section. If you're having trouble, contact our support team and we'll help you retrieve your ticket information.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and Apple Pay. All payments are processed securely through our trusted payment partners.

refunds.question: How do I get a refund?
refunds.answer: Refund policies vary by event. For cancelled events, refunds are automatic. For other cases, contact the event organizer first. If you need help, reach out to our support team.

orderHistory.question: Where can I find my order history?
orderHistory.answer: Your complete order history is available in the "Orders" section. You can view past purchases, download receipts, and track refund status for all your transactions.

saveEvent.question: How do I save an event to favorites?
saveEvent.answer: Click the heart icon on any event card to save it to your favorites. You can access all your saved events in the "Favorite Events" section.

manageFavorites.question: How do I manage my favorite events?
manageFavorites.answer: Go to "Favorite Events" to view, organize, and remove events from your favorites list. You can also create custom lists to organize events by category.

favoriteNotifications.question: Can I get notifications for my favorite events?
favoriteNotifications.answer: Yes! Enable notifications in your account settings to receive updates about price changes, new tickets, or reminders for your favorite events.

viewOrders.question: How do I view my order history?
viewOrders.answer: Go to "Order History" in your account to see all your past purchases. You can filter by date, event, or status to find specific orders.

downloadReceipts.question: How do I download receipts?
downloadReceipts.answer: In your Order History, click on any order and select "Download Receipt" to get a PDF copy of your purchase receipt.

trackRefunds.question: How do I track refund status?
trackRefunds.answer: Refund status is shown in your Order History. You'll receive email notifications when refunds are processed, and the status will update automatically.

downloadApp.question: How do I download the mobile app?
downloadApp.answer: Search for "Bilten" in the App Store (iOS) or Google Play Store (Android) to download our mobile app for the best experience.

mobileTickets.question: How do I access tickets on mobile?
mobileTickets.answer: Your tickets are automatically available in the mobile app. Open the app, go to "My Tickets", and show the QR code at the event entrance.

mobileNotifications.question: How do I manage mobile notifications?
mobileNotifications.answer: Go to Settings > Notifications in the mobile app to customize which notifications you receive, including event reminders and updates.

websiteNotLoading.question: The website is not loading properly
websiteNotLoading.answer: Try refreshing the page, clearing your browser cache, or using a different browser. If the problem persists, check your internet connection or contact our technical support team.

cantLogin.question: I can't log into my account
cantLogin.answer: First, make sure you're using the correct email and password. If you've forgotten your password, use the "Forgot Password" link. If you're still having issues, contact support.

mobileAppNotWorking.question: The mobile app is not working
mobileAppNotWorking.answer: Try updating the app to the latest version, restarting your device, or reinstalling the app. If problems continue, please report the issue with your device and app version details.

liveChat.title: Live Chat
liveChat.description: Get instant help from our support team

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Bilten. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team for personalized help.

noResults.title: No questions found
noResults.subtitle: Try adjusting your search terms or browse all categories below.

whatIsBilten.question: What is Bilten?
whatIsBilten.answer: Bilten is a comprehensive event management platform that connects event organizers with attendees. We provide tools for creating, managing, and discovering events of all types and sizes.

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.answer: Creating an account is easy! Click the "Sign Up" button in the top right corner, fill in your details, and verify your email address. You can also sign up using your Google or Facebook account.

isFree.question: Is Bilten free to use?
isFree.answer: Bilten offers both free and premium features. Basic event creation and browsing are free, while advanced features like analytics, custom branding, and priority support are available with our premium plans.

eventTypes.question: What types of events can I create?
eventTypes.answer: You can create virtually any type of event: concerts, conferences, workshops, meetups, sports events, exhibitions, webinars, and more. Our platform is designed to accommodate events of all sizes and formats.

createEvent.question: How do I create my first event?
createEvent.answer: To create an event, log in to your account and click "Create Event" in your dashboard. Fill in the event details, set your ticket prices, choose your venue, and publish your event. Our step-by-step wizard will guide you through the process.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you support?
paymentMethods.answer: We support major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through our trusted payment partners.

manageSales.question: How do I manage ticket sales?
manageSales.answer: You can manage ticket sales through your organizer dashboard. Track sales in real-time, view attendee lists, send updates to attendees, and generate reports. You can also set up different ticket types and pricing tiers.

cancelEvent.question: Can I cancel or reschedule an event?
cancelEvent.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule events through your dashboard. We recommend notifying attendees as early as possible. Our refund policies are clearly outlined in our terms of service.

promoteEvent.question: How do I promote my event?
promoteEvent.answer: Bilten offers multiple promotion tools: social media integration, email marketing, featured event placement, and SEO optimization. You can also use our analytics to understand your audience and improve your marketing strategy.

findEvents.question: How do I find events?
findEvents.answer: Browse events by category, location, or date on our events page. Use the search function to find specific events, or check out our recommendations based on your interests and past attendance.

purchaseTickets.question: How do I purchase tickets?
purchaseTickets.answer: Select your desired event, choose your ticket type and quantity, and proceed to checkout. You can pay with credit card, PayPal, or other supported payment methods. Tickets are delivered instantly via email.

refunds.question: Can I get a refund if I can't attend?
refunds.answer: Refund policies vary by event and are set by the organizer. Check the event details for specific refund information. In most cases, refunds are available up to 24-48 hours before the event.

accessTickets.question: How do I access my tickets?
accessTickets.answer: Tickets are sent to your email immediately after purchase. You can also access them in your account under "My Tickets". For mobile entry, simply show the QR code on your phone at the event.

eventCancelled.question: What if an event is cancelled?
eventCancelled.answer: If an event is cancelled, you'll receive an email notification and automatic refund. The refund will be processed to your original payment method within 5-10 business days.

security.question: Are my payment details secure?
security.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard SSL encryption and PCI DSS compliance to protect your payment information. We never store your full credit card details on our servers.

fees.question: What are the service fees?
fees.answer: Service fees vary by event type and ticket price. Fees are clearly displayed before purchase and typically range from 3-8% of the ticket price. Organizers can choose to absorb these fees or pass them to attendees.

payouts.question: When do organizers receive their payments?
payouts.answer: Payments are typically processed within 3-5 business days after the event concludes. For recurring events, payments are processed monthly. You can track payment status in your organizer dashboard.

paymentPlans.question: Do you offer payment plans?
paymentPlans.answer: Payment plans are available for certain event types and ticket prices. Look for the "Payment Plan" option during checkout. Plans typically allow you to pay in 2-4 installments.

browsers.question: What browsers are supported?
browsers.answer: Bilten works on all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend using the latest version of your browser for the best experience.

mobileApp.question: Is there a mobile app?
mobileApp.answer: Yes, we have mobile apps for iOS and Android. Download them from the App Store or Google Play Store for the best mobile experience, including offline ticket access.

resetPassword.question: How do I reset my password?
resetPassword.answer: Click "Forgot Password" on the login page, enter your email address, and follow the instructions in the reset email. You can also change your password in your account settings.

integration.question: Can I integrate Bilten with my website?
integration.answer: Yes, we offer API access and embeddable widgets for organizers. Contact our support team for integration documentation and assistance.

privacy.question: How do you protect my personal information?
privacy.answer: We follow strict data protection regulations and use industry-standard security measures. Your personal information is encrypted and never shared with third parties without your consent.

deleteAccount.question: Can I delete my account?
deleteAccount.answer: Yes, you can delete your account in your account settings. Note that this action is permanent and will cancel any upcoming events you've organized or purchased tickets for.

dataBreach.question: How do you handle data breaches?
dataBreach.answer: In the unlikely event of a data breach, we have a comprehensive response plan. We'll notify affected users immediately and take all necessary steps to secure accounts and prevent further issues.

help.title: Need More Help?
help.subtitle: Our support team is here to help you with any questions or issues you might have.

email.title: Email Support
email.description: Send us an email and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

phone.title: Phone Support
phone.description: Call us during business hours for immediate assistance.

ticketTypes.backStageDescription: Exclusive backstage access with meet & greet opportunity

analytics.question: What analytics are available for organizers?
analytics.answer: Organizers get access to comprehensive analytics including ticket sales, attendee demographics, marketing performance, and revenue tracking. Advanced features include custom reports and data export.

customization.question: Can I customize the look of my event pages?
customization.answer: Yes, premium organizers can customize event pages with their branding, colors, and logos. We also offer custom domain options for professional event websites.

bulkOperations.question: Can I perform bulk operations on tickets?
bulkOperations.answer: Yes, organizers can perform bulk operations like sending mass emails, updating ticket information, and generating reports for multiple events or ticket types.
